overview:
Harry Joiner is an executive recruiter for online marketing and ecommerce. He has been profiled in MarketingSherpa’s “Great Minds in Marketing” series and appeared in the print and online editions of The Wall Street Journal and on USAToday.com.

Harry has closed dozens of Manager, Director, VP, and C-level ecommerce searches for the following companies:
